link_desc:
I made this Fortigate SNMPv3 template, because I didn't see one in the share yet.

There is two templates in the Git repo. One for a Cluster and one for a standalone Fortigate!!

Kudos to these two templates who I used to make this SNMPv3:

https://share.zabbix.com/network_devices/fortigate/fortigate-snmp-template-v2019

https://share.zabbix.com/network_devices/fortigate/fortigate-snmp-template

It has interface discovery and all the general necessary items. I will update it if I find some more features.

It's important to add your authentication details in a Macro!

{$FGT_V3_USER} = Username

{$FGT_V3_AUTHPASS} = Authentication and Privacy key
author: larcorba
